title: Impact of Visual Realism on Technology-Enhanced Learning: An Experiment-Based Evaluation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Experimental design to analyze the relationship between visual realism and learning outcomes in a restricted technological environment (primarily smartphones).

learning_goals: Compare and explain characteristics of learning materials with varying levels of visual realism
Evaluate interactions between visual realism levels and test types by analyzing experimental data
Learners can propose visualization strategies suitable for educational contexts based on research findings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
